law.catch_line: Required equipment -- Prohibition against operation without required equipment.

text.section: Except during an authorized race or regatta, which shall include trial runs in preparation for such race or regatta to be conducted at a time and place designated by the department, it shall be illegal to operate any motorboat without an effective exhaust muffling system, or in any manner which renders the exhaust muffling system ineffective in muffling the sound of engine exhaust.

No person shall operate or give permission for the operation of a motorboat which is not equipped as required by this section or modification thereof or which is not safe for operation as a motorboat.

law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1978, sec. 263, sec. 13, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 292, sec. 15. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 133, sec. 2. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 68, Art. VIII, sec. 22.
